titles.title: Brother Let Me Be Your Servant

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brother let me be your servant, Let me be as Christ to you. Pray that I might have the grace To let you be my servant too.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are pilgrims on a journey We are brothers on the road. We are here to help each other Walk the mile and bear the load.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will hold the Christ light for you In the night time of your fear. I will hold my hand out to you. Speak the peace you long to hear.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will weep when you are weeping. When you laugh, I’ll laugh with you. I will share your joy and sorrow Till we’ve seen this journey through.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we sing to God in heaven, We shall find such harmony. Born of all we’ve known together Of Christ’s love and agony.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brother let me be your servant Let me be as Christ to you. Pray that I might have the grace To let you be my servant too.{/lang-eng}
